402:1: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkabhī bhagavantametadavocat–kuto bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā prāpyate?
402:3: na ca tathāgatā jānanti prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ|
402:4: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–yadbhagavan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā na jānanti?
402:5: bhagavānāha–kulaputra sā ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā tvavalokiteśvarasya paramahṛdayam |
402:6: yaśca paramahṛdayaṃ jānāti sa mokṣaṃ jānāti |
402:7: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–asti bhagavan kecitsattvā ye ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ jānanti?
402:10: eṣā durāsadā aprameyā yoginastathāgatā jānanti prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ |
402:11: asyāḥ kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīmahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇena sarve tathāgatāḥ ṣoḍaśakalyāṇasaṃkhyeyāḥ paribhramitāḥ prāgeva bodhisattvabhūtāḥ kuto jānanti ?
402:15: puṇyavantaste sattvā ye ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ satataparigrahaṃ japābhiyuktā bhavanti |
402:31: ye ca tava kulaputra kukṣigatāḥ prāṇinaḥ,
402:33: yaḥ kaścidimāṃ dhārayet ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ kāyagatāṃ kaṇṭhagatāṃ vā,
402:37: yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japanti so'kṣayapratibhāno bhavati |
402:42: yasya kasyaciducchavasyocchvāsapraśvāsaṃ dadāti maitryā vā dveṣeṇa vā,
402:47: darśanamātreṇa strī vā puruṣo vā dārikā vā mṛgapakṣiṇo gomahiṣagardabhādayaśca cakṣurdarśanenāpi paśyanti,
402:51: evaṃ tu ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ japamānasya saṃcodano bhavati ||
402:52: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–kathaṃ bhagavan labheyamahaṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyām?
402:53: so'cintyo yogānāṃ cāprameyadhyānānāṃ ca aparisthitaścānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
402:65: yadi bhagavan likhyamānāyāpi bhūrjaṃ na saṃvidyate,
402:71: tadāpi bhagavan mama nāsti khedaṃ śarīrasya |
402:72: sa ca me mātāpitṛbhūto bhavet gurūṇāmapi guruśca ||
402:73: atha bhagavān sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat–smarāmyahaṃ kulaputra asyāḥ ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇena paramāṇurajopamān lokadhātūn paribhramitaḥ |
402:75: na ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sakāśātsacālaṃbāpi (?) śrutā |
402:76: tadā ratnottamo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
402:78: tadā tena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhihitam–mā kulaputra evaṃ karuṇakarūṇānyaśrūṇi pramuñca |
402:79: gaccha kulaputra yena padmottamo nāma lokadhātuḥ |
402:82: tasya kulaputra ahaṃ ratnottamasya tathāgatasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ|
402:84: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā purastātprāñjalībhūtvottam–labheyamahaṃ bhagavan padmottama ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīṃ yasyā nāmānusmaraṇamātreṇa sarvapāpāni kṣayante,
402:88: tadā padmottamastathāgata imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāguṇāṃ saṃsmārayati sma–tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate paramāṇurajaḥpramāṇamudgṛhītum,
402:89: na tu kulaputra śakyate ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
402:90: śakyate mayā kulaputra catuḥsamudrasyaikaikāṃ vālukāṃ gaṇayitum,
402:91: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
402:92: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra kaścideva puruṣo bhavet|
402:93: sa gṛhaṃ pūrṇaṃ yojanasahasraṃ kuryāt dviguṇaṃ pañcayojanaśatāni |
402:98: tadanena paryāyeṇa taṃ gṛhasamūhapratiṣṭhitāstilāḥ parikṣayaparyavadānaṃ yāvatkālena vrajeyuḥ,
402:100: na tu kulaputra śakyate ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
402:101: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvīpe nānāvidhāni kṛṣiṃ kārayanti yavagodhūmaśālimudgamāṣādayastilakolakulatthādibhiḥ,
402:106: tataste śakaṭairbhārairmuṭaiḥ piṭhakairgobhirgardabhādibhirlaṅghayitvā tasmin khalābhyantare prakṣiperan,
402:108: śakyate mayā kulaputra ekaikāni phalāni gaṇayitum,
402:109: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
402:110: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra imā mahānadyo jambudvīpe pravahanti rātrau divā ca|
402:111: tadyathā gaṅgā sītā yamunā sindhuḥ śatadruḥ candrabhāgā erāvatī sumāgandhā himaratī kalaśodarī ceti |
402:113: rātrau ca divā ca mahāsamudre pravahanti |
402:115: tatrāsāṃ mahānadīnāṃ śakyate mayā ekaikabinduṃ gaṇayitum |
402:116: na ca kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
402:117: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvīpeṣu catuṣpājjātīnāṃ gogardabhamahiṣāśvahastinaḥ,
402:121: na tu kulaputra ṣaḍākṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
402:122: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vajrāṅkuśo nāma parvatarājo navanavatiyojanasahasrāṇyucchrayeṇa caturaśītiyojanasahasrāṇyadhastāt|
402:124: tasya ca pārśve parvatarājasya jarāmaraḥ puruṣo bhavet|
402:126: evaṃ kṛtvā tasya parikṣayaṃ paryavadānaṃ bhavet,
402:129: na tu ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum|
402:130: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudraṃ caturaśītiyojanasahasraṃ gāmbhīryeṇa,
402:131: aprameyaṃ vaipulyena vaḍavāmukhaparyantaṃ śakyate mayā śatāgrabhinnayā vālagrakoṭyā ekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum |
402:132: na tu kulaputra śakyate mayā ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
402:133: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra śakyate mayā śīrṣavanasya ekaikapatrāṇi gaṇayitum,
402:134: na tu ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ śakyate ekajāpasya puṇyaskandham gaṇayitum|
402:135: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra caturdvipanivāsinaṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāste sarve daśabhūmipratiṣṭhitā bodhisattvā bhaveyuḥ |
402:138: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa adhimāsikena trayodaśamāsikena vā saṃvatsareṇa tathā saṃvatsaragaṇanayā pūrṇa kalpaṃ devo ratrau divā varṣati,
402:139: tacchakyate mayā kulaputra ekaikaṃ binduṃ gaṇayitum |
402:140: na tu kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā ekajāpasya puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
402:141: evaṃ kulaputra bahavo matsadṛśāḥ tathāgatakoṭaya ekasthānadhāritā divyaṃ kalpaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvopakaraṇopasthāne nopasthitā bhaveyuḥ |
402:142: na ca tathāgatāḥ śaknuvanti ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyāḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ gaṇayitum |
402:150: evaṃ kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarimahāvidyāyā upāyakauśalyaṃ prāptumahamapi kulaputra anekāni lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paribhramitaḥ |
402:151: gatvā cāmitābhasya tathāgatasya purastātprāñjalībhūtvā dharmavegenāśrūṇi pramuktāni,
402:153: tena mamābhihitam–kulaputra ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ rājñīmicchasi bhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ ?
402:155: yathā tṛṣārtaḥ pānīyamanveṣate evamahaṃ bhagavan ṣaḍakṣarīṃ mahāvidyāṃ samanveṣamāṇo'nekalokadhātūnupasaṃkrāntaḥ |
402:157: na kasyacitsakāśānmayā labdhā ṣaḍakṣarī mahāvidyā rājñī |
402:166: athāmitābhasya tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya lambikarutena svareṇa nirghoṣeṇārocayati–pasya kulaputra ayaṃ padmottamastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ ṣaḍakṣarīmahāvidyāyāḥ kāraṇenānekalokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi paribhramitaḥ|
